hero.title: About the Kyrgyz Financial Alliance
hero.subtitle: Self-regulatory organization of professional participants of the securities market of the Kyrgyz Republic

mission.title: Our Mission and Values
mission.description: KFA unites the professional community of securities market participants to develop a transparent, efficient and sustainable financial market in Kyrgyzstan

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Promoting the development of a professional and transparent securities market through the establishment of high standards of activity and protection of participants' interests

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To become the leading self-regulatory organization in Central Asia, recognized for high quality standards and contribution to the development of the region's financial market

history.title: KFA Development History
history.subtitle: From creation to becoming a leading self-regulatory organization

events.event1.title: Organization establishment
events.event1.description: Establishment of the Kyrgyz Financial Alliance as a self-regulatory organization of professional participants in the securities market
events.event2.title: First certification program
events.event2.description: Launch of certification program for securities market specialists. First 50 specialists received KFA certificates
events.event3.title: International recognition
events.event3.description: Signing of cooperation agreements with leading international organizations and joining the association of self-regulatory organizations
events.event4.title: Digital transformation
events.event4.description: Launch of digital platform for KFA members with personal accounts, online courses and electronic document management
events.event5.title: Expansion of activities
events.event5.description: Opening of regional office in Osh. The number of organization members exceeded 100 companies
events.event6.title: New standards
events.event6.description: Adoption of updated professional standards and code of ethics that meet international requirements

leadership.subtitle: Experienced financial market professionals leading the organization
